entities.name: severus
entities.description: Severus is mentioned as a person who cannot pretend that something isn't happening. He is also mentioned as someone who will make excuses for Karkaroff to flee.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is mentioned as a person who is anxious and hushed, and is concerned about something that has been happening for months. He is also mentioned as someone who looks discomposed to see Harry and Ron standing there.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a person who is curtly telling Karkaroff to flee, and is also seen blasting rosebushes apart with his wand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who sees Karkaroff looking discomposed to see him standing there.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who is standing with Harry on the path ahead.

relationships.description: Severus is concerned about something that Karkaroff is experiencing, as evident from the conversation between them.
Snape is telling Karkaroff to flee, as mentioned in their conversation.
Severus is making excuses for Karkaroff to flee, as mentioned in the conversation between them and Harry.
Snape is blasting rosebushes apart with his wand, as seen in the scene.
